<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H7218|רֹאשׁ]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רֵאשׁ‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Dan.7.6|Dan 7:6]]</sup> ==head== (Egyptian Aramaic, [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>Pap</sup>.; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רש‎</span>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רֵישׁ‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ראֹשׁ‎</span>); — construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ר‎</span> [[Dan.7.1|Dan 7:1]] emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הָ֯‎</span> [[Dan.2.38|Dan 2:38]] suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רֵאשׁי‎</span> [[Dan.4.2|Dan 4:2]] +, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חָ֯‎</span> [[Dan.2.28|Dan 2:28]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵּ֯‎</span> v[[Dan.2.32|Dan 2:32]] +, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַּ֯‎</span> [[Dan.7.20|Dan 7:20]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵ֯וֺן‎</span> [[Dan.3.27|Dan 3:27]] plural absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רֵאשִׁין‎</span> [[Dan.7.6|Dan 7:6]], suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רָאשֵׁיהֹם‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§§ 53, Anm. b</sup>); 63 [[BDB#Gu|Gu]]<sup>Hpt on the passage</sup>) [[Ezra.5.10|Ezra 5:10]] — 


**1.** ***head*** of man [[Dan.3.27|Dan 3:27]], compare [[Dan.7.9|Dan 7:9]] in vision: of image [[Dan.2.32|Dan 2:32]]; [[Dan.2.38|Dan 2:38]], beast [[Dan.7.6|Dan 7:6]]; [[Dan.7.20|Dan 7:20]]. 

**2.** ***head*** as seat of visions, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֶזְוֵי רֵאשָׁךְ‎</span>, etc., [[Dan.2.28|Dan 2:28]]; [[Dan.4.2|Dan 4:2]]; [[Dan.4.7|Dan 4:7]]; [[Dan.4.10|Dan 4:10]]; [[Dan.7.1|Dan 7:1]]; [[Dan.7.15|Dan 7:15]]. 

**3.** = ***chief***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּר‎</span> [[Ezra.5.10|Ezra 5:10]] ***in the capacity of their chiefs***. 

**4.** ***sum***, essential content, of matters [[Dan.7.1|Dan 7:1]] ([[BDB#Nes|Nes]]<sup>MM 40</sup> ***beginning***).
